airframe.name: VOR
airframe.makefile:
ARCHI=arm7
VOR=vor
FLASH_MODE = IAP main.ARCHDIR = $(ARCHI) main.ARCH = arm7tdmi main.TARGET = main main.TARGETDIR = main
main.CFLAGS += -DCONFIG=\"conf_demo.h\" main.srcs = $(VOR)/vor_main.c
main.CFLAGS += -DPERIODIC_TASK_PERIOD='SYS_TICS_OF_SEC(1e-1)' main.srcs += sys_time.c $(SRC_ARCH)/sys_time_hw.c
main.CFLAGS += -DLED
main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART0 -DUART0_BAUD=B38400 main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/uart_hw.c
main.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=Uart0 main.srcs += downlink.c pprz_transport.c
main.CFLAGS += -DFLOAT_T=float main.srcs += $(VOR)/vor_filter.c $(VOR)/vor_filter_params.c
main.srcs += $(VOR)/vor_demod.c
